brilliant end to this saga  the way character relationships are explored in this structure is so fun focused on the couples youve grown so fond of  the fakeout of the xcodes not meaning anything is a gaming moment that will stick with me i was taking copious notes only to feel the same despair as cteam when they found out they dont carry over  there was maybe 1 puzzle that was a little annoying but overall super fair
